Requirements Your last action was a melee Strike that dealt sneak attack damage to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] target

After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open. You deal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} to the target equal to your number of sneak attack damage dice.
